recipe_def.assumptions: Assemble station per BOM; imported compute/sensors.
recipe_def.notes: Coarse assembly route; refine with detailed steps later.

steps.notes: Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Cut steel tubing or angle iron for frame legs, crossmembers, and work surface supports
Weld frame structure with reinforcements and tool mounting points
Machine mounting holes, leveling feet locations, and tool holder attachment points

recipe_def.assumptions: Welded steel frame structure for assembly and tool work. Provides stable platform for hand tools and fixtures.
recipe_def.notes: Frame for tool station or light assembly workbench. Sturdy construction for various manufacturing tasks.

steps.notes: Forge tool blanks from steel stock, harden and temper, machine to final dimensions, assemble multi-part tools

recipe_def.assumptions: Steel tools forged, heat treated, and machined. Typical hand tool set including wrenches, pliers, hammers, screwdrivers. Total mass ~20 kg.
recipe_def.notes: General purpose hand tool set for assembly and maintenance operations.

steps.notes: Sort and kit fasteners by size and type. Package in organized container with dividers for each size/type.

recipe_def.assumptions:
Assembles 1.0 kg fastener_kit_medium from pre-manufactured components per BOM.
Requires all components from bom_fastener_kit_medium_v0:
  - 0.720 kg bolt_hex_medium_steel
  - 0.180 kg nut_hex_medium_steel
  - 0.075 kg washer_flat_medium_steel
  - 0.030 kg washer_lock_medium_steel
Labor-intensive sorting and organization to create useful mixed kit.
recipe_def.notes:
Kit assembly recipe that combines individual fastener components into organized
mixed kit. Most commonly used kit in KB (107 BOMs reference this item).
Sorting ensures user can quickly find needed size without having to maintain
separate inventory of each fastener size.
Alternative production path: recipe_fastener_kit_small_v0 uses integrated
casting+machining+kitting approach without separate component recipes.

recipe_def.assumptions: 12 kg power conditioning module; includes imported electronics.
recipe_def.notes: Three-step recipe for power conditioning module.

recipe_def.assumptions: Assemble station per BOM; imported compute/sensors.
recipe_def.notes: Coarse assembly route; refine with detailed steps later.
